testcase.name: Adding item to the cart functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User already on homepage..............................................passed When User search for Aviator................................................passed Then User selects a Product.................................................passed Then User on product page...................................................passed And User clicks on Buy Now..................................................passed Then User will successfully add item to the Cart............................passed

testcase.name: Removing item from an empty cart functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User already on homepage..............................................passed When User clicks on cart link...............................................passed Then User sees "Your shopping cart is empty! !".............................passed

testcase.name: Removing item from cart functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User already on homepage..............................................passed When User search for Aviator................................................passed Then User selects a Product.................................................passed Then User on product page...................................................passed And User clicks on Buy Now..................................................passed Then User will successfully add item to the Cart............................passed Then User goto the homepage.................................................passed When User clicks on cart link...............................................passed Then User removes an Item from the cart.....................................passed Then User sees "Your shopping cart is empty! !".............................passed

testcase.name: Appointment booking functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User already on homepage..............................................passed When User hover over store locator and clicks locate a store................passed Then User on store page.....................................................passed And User searches "Murinjapalam" and selects the first suggestion...........passed Then User book a free appointment from the top most list....................passed

testcase.name: Login to existing account
testcase.system-out: Given User already on homepage..............................................passed When User clicks on signIn Link.............................................passed Then User enters email and password and logins..............................passed And 'Vivek' will be loggedIn to their homepage..............................passed

testcase.name: User tries to login with Invalid Email
testcase.system-out: Given User already on homepage..............................................passed When User clicks on signIn Link.............................................passed Then User enters wrong email 'fakeusertest@gmail.com'.......................passed And User get "Account doesn't exist. Use different phone number or email." as error.passed

testcase.name: User tries to login with Invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User already on homepage..............................................passed When User clicks on signIn Link.............................................passed Then User enters email and password and logins..............................passed And User get "Either Email or Password is Incorrect" as error...............passed

testcase.name: Creating a new Account
testcase.system-out: Given User already on homepage..............................................passed When User clicks on the signup Link.........................................passed Then new window pop ups.....................................................passed And User fills all required feilds..........................................passed

testcase.name: Creating a new account with already existing email
